snippet: Conservatives have long considered Bob Woodward a scourge for helping to break the Watergate scandal, but this week many lauded his account of a dispute with the White House over his fiscal coverage.
abstract: Revered journalist Bob Woodward finds unexpected support from conservatives and Republicans after he voices criticism of Obama administration's approach to sequester; Republicans have long considered Woodward scourge for his coverage of Watergate scandal during Nixon administration.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUGHNEY and BRIAN STELTER

lead_paragraph: Conservatives have long considered Bob Woodward a scourge for helping to break the Watergate scandal, but this week many lauded his account of a dispute with the White House over his fiscal coverage.

headline.seo: Woodward Clashes With White House and Conservatives Take Note
headline.main: Woodward Is New Hero for the Right (Yes, Really)
headline.print_headline: Woodward Is New Hero For the Right (Yes, Really)
